Earth Day 2023
Philipp, EarthDay 2023 is scheduled to be the biggest environmental event in history. With Fortune 50s, hundreds of SMBs, and industry leading tree planting groups already joining forces, we’re making history and we’d like you to be a part of it. 

What’s the best way to get some time on the calendar to discuss Earth Day 2023?

Best regards,
Jo

https://bit.ly/Meet-With-ForTreesClub
MAR 3
Philipp Hartmann sent the following messages at 2:35 PM
View Philipp’s profilePhilipp Hartmann
Philipp Hartmann 2:35 PM
Hello Jo, thanks for you message and great you support EarthDay, But I am not a correct contact person enabling any support for sustainable projects nor . Thanks Philipp

Jo Peninsulas 3:35 PM
Hello Philipp,

Thank you for your response, and I apologize if I reached out to the wrong person. If you happen to know anyone within your network who might be interested in supporting or collaborating on Earth Day 2023 initiatives, I would be grateful if you could kindly introduce us or share our information with them.

I appreciate your time and understanding. Have a great day!

Best regards,
Jo

Hello Chin,

Thank you for your response, and I completely understand that your time and commitments are valuable. I appreciate your kind words and your support for our initiatives. If you happen to know anyone within your network who might be interested in learning more or getting involved, please feel free to share our information with them.

Wishing you all the best in your work and time with your family. Have a great day!

Best regards,
Jo

Thanks you for the response, Sarmad.

We've received a fantastic response to our LinkedIn activities so we have decided to run weekly sessions every Friday to run through our programs and answer any questions you may have. The slots available are bookable via the link below:
https://calendly.com/wemakeimpact/12-sdg-s-with-we-make-impact

Looking forward to seeing you on Friday!

Stay hydrated,
Jo

12 SDG's with We Make Impact - We Make Impact
calendly.com
OCT 27, 2022
View Jo’s profileJo Peninsulas
Jo Peninsulas 7:40 PM
Hi Sarmad, 

I hope this finds you well.

I wanted to share an interesting article from our Founder, Isaac Cohen, about creating a For-Good-Economy. I particularly found the creative ways to attach a for-good angle to generate more revenue, and at the same time, make the world a better place.

4-minute read - let me know what you think.

Best regards,
Jo 

https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/for-good-economy-its-good-business-do-isaac-cohen-?trk=public\_profile\_article\_view

Hi Sarmad,

No worries at all! I understand how busy life can get. I hope you have a safe and productive trip. Please feel free to reach out to me when you're back in mid-March, and we can schedule a time to connect and discuss our projects and ideas.

Wishing you all the best in your travels!

Best regards,
Jo
